description: [Pikabot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1145) further decrypts information embedded via steganography using AES-CBC with the same 32 bit key as initial XOR operations combined with the first 16 bytes of the encrypted data as an initialization vector.(Citation: Zscaler Pikabot 2023) Other [Pikabot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1145) variants include encrypted, chunked sections of the stage 2 payload in the initial loader .text section before decrypting and assembling these during execution.(Citation: Elastic Pikabot 2024)

external_references.description: Brett Stone-Gross & Nikolaos Pantazopoulos. (2023, May 24). Technical Analysis of Pikabot. Retrieved July 12, 2024.
Daniel Stepanic & Salim Bitam. (2024, February 23). PIKABOT, I choose you!. Retrieved July 12, 2024.
